title: ZACK BIA RUNS HOLLYWOOD â€” BFFs EP. 61 W/ STETSON BENNETT
description:
On this week's pod, we're joined by the mystery man who is all over LA Zack Bia. We talk to him about his past relationships, his DJ career, and how he became friends with every A List celebrity under the sun. Later in the show we're joined by Georgia MVP QB Stetson Bennett two days after winning a national title.
